item.title: 受特朗普汽车关税影响，日本汽车制造商股价暴跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对所有进口汽车征收 25% 的关税后，日本汽车制造商的股价暴跌，引发了人们对这将损害美国主要市场销售的担忧。【原文：Shares of Japanese carmakers slumped after US President Donald Trump slapped a 25% tariff on all auto imports, raising concern that it will hurt sales in the key American market.】

item.title: 高盛和法国巴黎银行认为韩国可转换债券热潮将重现
item.description: 一旦卖空禁令很快解除，韩国可能会迎来一波可转换债券发行潮，这要归功于对冲基金的回归，它们是混合债券的主要买家。【原文：South Korea may see a wave of convertible bond issuance once a short-selling ban is lifted soon, thanks to the likely return of hedge funds that are major buyers of the hybrid debt.】

item.title: OpenAI 接近完成软银领投的 400 亿美元融资
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，OpenAI 即将完成由软银集团（SoftBank Group Corp. —）领投的 400 亿美元融资；包括 Magnetar Capital、Coatue Management、Founders Fund 和 Altimeter Capital Management 在内的投资者也在洽谈中。【原文：OpenAI is close to finalizing a $40 billion funding round led by SoftBank Group Corp. — with investors including Magnetar Capital, Coatue Management, Founders Fund and Altimeter Capital Management in talks to participate, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 卡尼计划应对美国汽车关税面临新考验
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）在准备返回渥太华与内阁成员计划政府的应对措施时说，美国对轿车和轻型卡车征收的新关税是对汽车行业工人的 "直接攻击"。【原文：Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney said new US tariffs on cars and light trucks are a “direct attack” on workers in the auto sector as he prepared to return to Ottawa to plan the government’s response with members of his cabinet.】

item.title: 美国库存创今年最大降幅，石油保持涨势
item.description: 在美国原油库存创下 12 月以来最大降幅，预示着近期供应紧张的前景之后，石油保持了涨势。【原文：Oil held a gain after US crude inventories fell the most since December, signaling the prospect for near-term supply tightness.】

item.title: 印度航空首席执行官称将以更低票价吸引印度侨民
item.description: 印度航空公司（Air India Ltd.）高级官员表示，该公司将以更低廉的票价吸引3500万印度侨民，因为该公司正努力弥补因升级延误而陈旧的客舱。【原文：Air India Ltd. will woo the 35-million strong Indian diaspora with cheaper fares, as the carrier seeks to make up for its dated cabins amid upgrade delays, its top official said.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚将使用 100 万只非洲象鼻虫刺激棕榈树产量
item.description: 印尼正寄希望于非洲的小虫子来帮助提高其棕榈油产量，因为整个行业都在努力应对供应紧张的问题，而供应紧张有可能导致价格上涨并加剧食品通胀。【原文：Indonesia is betting on tiny bugs from Africa to help boost its palm oil production, as the broader sector grapples with tightening supply that threatens to keep prices elevated and add to food inflation.】

item.title: Dollarama 将以市值两倍的价格收购零售商 Reject Shop
item.description: 加拿大 Dollarama 公司已同意收购澳大利亚折扣零售商 Reject Shop Ltd.，交易溢价超过 100%。【原文：Canada’s Dollarama Inc. has agreed to buy Australian discount retailer Reject Shop Ltd. in a deal pitched at a more than 100% premium.】

item.title: 中国科技股延续涨势需要的不仅仅是人工智能炒作
item.description: 随着今年中国科技股在人工智能领域的大涨被按下暂停键，可能需要全球经济政策的明朗化和核心业务改善的具体迹象才能让一切重新开始。【原文：With the pause button pressed on this year’s huge AI rally in Chinese tech stocks, clarity on global economic policies and concrete signs of core business improvement may be required to get things rolling again.】

item.title: 中国通过债券融资 2,000 亿美元释放刺激信号
item.description: 本季度，中国加大了债务发行力度，此举既表明中国政府将刺激经济增长放在首位，也表明中国正努力防止过热的债券市场重演。【原文：China ramped up debt issuance this quarter, a move that both signals authorities’ priority on stimulating growth and efforts to prevent a repeat of an overheated bond market.】

item.title: 市场综述：特朗普削弱风险，亚洲股市将重现跌势
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普贸易政策的不确定性加剧，风险偏好受挫，亚洲股市周四将重现跌势。【原文：The selloff in Asian equities is set to resume on Thursday as risk appetite is scuppered amid heightened uncertainty over President Donald Trump’s trade policy.】

item.title: 破产的 23andMe DNA 数据获得出售许可，但担忧仍未消除
item.description: 破产的基因检测公司 23andMe Holding Co. 获得了法官的许可，可以尝试出售客户的医疗和祖先相关数据信息，这些数据被认为是破产案中最有价值的资产— 在公司倒闭之际，这些数据已成为隐私和安全问题的根源。【原文：Bankrupt genetic testing firm 23andMe Holding Co. won permission from a judge to try to sell information about customers’ medical and ancestry-related data, a trove that is considered the most valuable asset in the insolvency case — and has become a source of privacy and safety concerns amid the company’s collapse.】

item.title: 饱受丑闻困扰的慧科面临来自顶级养老金的日益增大的压力
item.description: 在丑闻缠身的创始人理查德-怀特（Richard White）上个月赶走了大部分董事会成员，并自任执行董事长之后，汇智环球有限公司正面临着来自澳大利亚最大的几家养老基金越来越大的压力，要求其解决治理方面的问题。【原文：WiseTech Global Ltd. is facing growing pressure from some of Australia’s biggest pension funds to address governance concerns, after scandal-plagued founder Richard White last month ousted most of the board and installed himself as executive chairman.】

item.title: Tether 收购意大利媒体公司 Be Water 30% 的股份
item.description: Tether Holdings SA 已同意收购意大利媒体公司 Be Water 30% 的股份，这家加密货币公司正在加紧进行交易。【原文：Tether Holdings SA has agreed to acquire a 30% stake in Italian media company Be Water, as the cryptocurrency firm ramps up its dealmaking.】

item.title: GameStop 借贷 13 亿美元资助比特币购买狂潮
item.description: GameStop 公司正在寻求出售 13 亿美元的无息可转换债券，为购买比特币提供资金，因为它采用了加密货币倡导者迈克尔-赛勒（Michael Saylor）制定的策略。【原文：GameStop Corp. is seeking to sell $1.3 billion of convertible bonds with no coupon payment to fund Bitcoin purchases as it embraces a strategy that was developed by the cryptocurrency advocate Michael Saylor.】

item.title: 花旗集团在日本招聘交易员，费用池有望复苏
item.description: 花旗集团正在扩大其在日本的投资银行团队，因为这家华尔街公司押注日本的交易费用在经历了长达二十年的低迷之后终将反弹。【原文：Citigroup Inc. is expanding its investment banking team in Japan as the Wall Street firm bets that the country’s deal fee pool will finally rebound after a two-decade slump.】

item.title: 特朗普称可能削减对华关税以达成 TikTok 协议
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他将考虑降低对中国征收的关税税率，以确保中国政府支持将字节跳动有限公司（ByteDance Ltd. ）旗下社交视频平台 TikTok 的美国业务出售给一家美国公司。【原文：President Donald Trump said he would consider lowering tariff rates imposed on China to secure Beijing’s support for a sale of the US operations of ByteDance Ltd.’s social video platform TikTok to an American company.】

item.title: 特朗普称互惠关税计划 "宽松"，但打击所有国家
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，作为其下周全面推进关税计划的一部分，他计划对每个国家征收互惠税，但表示税率将低于预期。【原文：President Donald Trump said he plans to impose reciprocal levies on every nation as part of his sweeping tariff push next week, but said the rates would be lower than expected.】

item.title: 银行家们梦想着在特朗普统治下获得 M&A 财富。但现在还没成功
item.description:
2025年伊始，交易商们预测这将是十年来最好的一次交易。但没过多久，他们就不得不面对严峻的现实。【原文：

Dealmakers started 2025 predicting one of the best hauls in a decade. It wasn’t long before they had to deliver a stark reality check.

】

item.title: 如果美国提前加征关税，铜最热门的贸易风险将痛苦收场
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对铜征收进口关税之前，贸易商们一直在为将铜运往美国而付出高昂的代价，现在他们面临着一场高风险的竞赛，必须及时将货物运往美国。【原文：Traders who have been paying dearly to ship copper to America before US President Donald Trump imposes import tariffs on the metal now face a high-stakes race to get shipments there in time.】

item.title: 大选猜测升温，澳大利亚匆忙减税
item.description: 澳大利亚中左翼政府在周四凌晨匆忙通过了议会的新一轮减税计划，引发了人们对几天内可能举行大选的猜测。【原文：Australia’s center-left government rushed its new round of tax cuts through the parliament in the early hours of Thursday morning, prompting speculation that an election could be called within days.】

item.title: 英国钢铁公司所有者敬业公司拒绝 5 亿英镑的政府救援协议
item.description: 英国钢铁公司的中国所有者拒绝了英国政府提出的 5 亿英镑（约合 6.44 亿美元）的救援计划，这使英国钢铁业的前景更加扑朔迷离。【原文：British Steel’s Chinese owner has rejected a £500 million ($644 million) UK government rescue package, throwing the future of the country’s steel industry into further doubt.】

item.title: 上诉法院继续阻止特朗普驱逐委内瑞拉人
item.description: 联邦上诉法院的一个合议庭继续暂停特朗普政府将被指控的委内瑞拉帮派成员驱逐到萨尔瓦多的行动，而没有给他们提出异议的机会。【原文：A federal appeals court panel kept in place a pause on the Trump administration’s deportation of alleged Venezuelan gang members to El Salvador without a chance to object.】

item.title: 贝森特称乌克兰正在审议美国提出的新经济建议
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，乌克兰政府正在审查美国提出的新经济伙伴关系建议，并希望双方能在下周尽快签署协议。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the Ukrainian government is reviewing a new economic partnership proposal from the US and hopes the agreement could be signed by the two parties as soon as next week.】

item.title: 1789 资本和 Type One 风险投资公司以 20 亿美元估值支持 Axiom Space
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，Axiom Space 公司正在完成由 1789 Capital 和 Type One Ventures 共同主导的新一轮融资。【原文：Axiom Space Inc. is finalizing a new funding round co-led by 1789 Capital and Type One Ventures, according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 里夫斯冒着秋季增税的风险再次进行预算赌博
item.description: 英国财政大臣蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）将财政缓冲区恢复到了 10 月份的水平，这是她为维护自己在市场上的信誉所做的最起码的努力。这样做确保了她在未来几个月内仍将是命运的人质。【原文：UK Chancellor Rachel Reeves did the minimum to preserve her credibility with markets when she restored her fiscal buffer to exactly where it was in October. In doing so, the ensured she would remain a hostage to fortune in the months ahead.】

item.title: 多尔称对中国船只征收港口费会抬高香蕉价格
item.description: 据美国最大的香蕉供应商称，遏制中国在全球海运业中的主导地位的建议将对香蕉产生巨大影响，并使已经对杂货店价格上涨敏感的消费者雪上加霜。【原文：A proposal to curb China’s dominance of the global maritime industry would have an out-sized impact on bananas — and aggravate consumers already sensitive to higher prices at the grocery store, according to the largest US supplier of the fruit.】

item.title: 特朗普冻结中美科技竞争中关键机构 10% 的资金
item.description: 一群民主党参议员警告说，白宫削减负责半导体出口管制的机构 10% 经费的举动有可能破坏美国在人工智能竞赛中领先中国的努力。【原文：A White House move to cut 10% of the funding for the agency responsible for semiconductor export controls risks undermining US efforts to stay ahead of China in the AI race, a group of Democratic senators warned.】

item.title: 聊天应用 Discord 正与高盛和摩根大通合作计划 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，深受视频游戏玩家和程序员欢迎的社交通讯平台 Discord Inc.【原文：Discord Inc., a social communications platform popular with video-game players and programmers, is working with Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and JPMorgan Chase & Co. on an initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 怀俄明州州长预计该州将于七月发行自己的稳定币
item.description: 怀俄明州计划尽快于 7 月推出自己的加密货币，使其成为第一个由美国实体发行的法币支持和完全保留的稳定代币。【原文：Wyoming plans launch its own cryptocurrency as soon as July, making it the first fiat-backed and fully-reserved stable token issued by a US entity.】
